trans-unit.source: A trigger action that stops a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En utløser handling som stopper en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use a StopStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively stop a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk en StopStoryboard handling med <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>eller <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>stoppe interaktivt <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: StopStoryboard only affects a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when it is active (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).
trans-unit.target: StopStoryboard påvirker bare en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>når det er aktivt (når det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>starter).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Stopping a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: Stopper et dreieboken utløser i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>hendelser, men ikke i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> that controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: I stedet <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>må referere til den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>som kontrollerer <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: Se [slik: Bruk hendelsesutløsere til å kontrollere en dreieboken etter den starter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) et eksempel.

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or StopStoryboard) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pause, Fortsett, Stopp eller ellers kontrollen en dreieboken interaktivt til kunne stanse midlertidig, gjenoppta eller ellers kontrollere en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>interaktivt angitt av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>og bruke en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objektet (eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, eller StopStoryboard) til å kontrollere ved å referere til den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>er ikke angitt, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>kan ikke kontrolleres interaktivt når den er startet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](../Topic/How%20to:%20Use%20Event%20Triggers%20to%20Control%20a%20Storyboard%20After%20It%20Starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se [slik: Bruk hendelsesutløsere til å kontrollere en dreieboken etter den starter](../Topic/How%20to:%20Use%20Event%20Triggers%20to%20Control%20a%20Storyboard%20After%20It%20Starts.md) for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard"> </xref> klasse.
